1190240.name: The Mutational - Charity Bundle
1190240.description:
Charity

All money that DinjaStudios earns from this DLC will be donated to:

- World Cancer Research Fund in The Netherlands

Perks

Adds six awesome perks to the game for you to enjoy.
The DLC will initially launch with three new perks:

- The Fire Dragon: Every enemy that gets killed by either you or your turrets will explode damaging other enemies around it. However the damage output of your turrets will be reduced by 33%.

- Smart Investor: Every dollar in your balance gives your turrets a 1% damage bonus. (Up to 500%)

- Risky move: Allows your balance to go negative (up to $500), however you have to pay 3.5% interest over your negative balance each wave.

After launch of the DLC we will add a new perk weekly based on community feedback until there are six perks in total!
